title: Eat Drink Wild
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, American, Pizza, International, Organic, Beer/Wine, Take-out, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Established in 2005, Slice seeks to evolve the current pizza eating experience by using fresh, local, seasonal ingredients and internationally-inspired toppings. Features flatbread pizzas made with variety of toppings from fresh vegetable to your choice of soy or rice cheese; gluten-free and spelt crust are available. Large selection of craft beers.
